about_the_game:
Leather Pi Chivalrous Dress Bag (with 29999 Ling coins) includes Leather Pi Chivalrous Permanent Unlock, and presents 29999 Ling coins with DLC.



"Wear armour and be gentle, and save lives with a sharp blade."

Black rubber jersey with red retro lightning lines, together with Pippy Man, surpass the speed of light, leading a new round of "lightning" wave!



Style:

Top: Pippy Chivalrous Custom

Pants: Pippy Knight Custom

Shoes: Pippy Man Custom

Other:
